cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 230 miles east of Tampico, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: forecast to meander in the west-central Gulf, then lift north and bend west toward the central Texas coast through Monday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast near Matagorda Bay

weather_observation.impacted_coast: western and north-western Gulf of Mexico from the Mexican coast northward to the upper Texas coast
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely; cumulative probability only 4% over the next five days.
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant surge expected along the southeast Louisiana coast given the distant track.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may brush southeast Louisiana late Sunday into Monday with light to moderate accumulations.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would meaningfully affect port operations
